mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from member inner join cart on member.id = cart.id inner join orders on cart.id = orders.id where member.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cartno, id) values((select nvl(max(cartno),0)+1 from cart), #{id})
mapper.select: select member.id, cart.CARTNO, orders.ORDERNO, orders.CONTENTSNO, orders.QUANTITY, orders.PNAME, orders.total, contents.FILENAME, contents.DETAIL from member inner join cart on member.id = cart.id inner join orders on cart.id = orders.id inner JOIN CONTENTS ON contents.CONTENTSNO = orders.CONTENTSNO where member.id = #{id}
